Classes/Bagels/responses.html.name: responses
Classes/Bagels/responses.html.abstract: Simple Enum for yes or no responses

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: generateRandomNumber()
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: generates the random number for the game. Returning struct number

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: checkFirstGuess(_:_:_:)
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: Checks for the player’s first guess Int<10

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: checkSecondGuess(_:_:_:)
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: Checks for the player’s second guess Int<10

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: checkThirdGuess(_:_:_:)
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: Checks for the player’s third guess Int<10

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: inputErrorTrapping(_:_:_:)
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: Trap for errors in keyboard input. No 0s are allowed in the game. if a 0 is found it restarts the getUserGuess() to try again.

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: getUserGuess(_:)
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: Get the player’s guess from the keyboard and convert it to number struct

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: checkForPICO(_:_:_:_:)
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: checks player’s guesses for pico (guessed right number but out of order). If it contains pico then it adds the hint to results

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: checkForFERMI(_:_:_:_:)
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: Checks the players guesses for Fermi (Correct placement of number)

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: checkForBAGELS(_:_:_:_:)
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: Checks that all of the player’s guesses are wron

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: wouldYouliketoplayagain()
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: Asks the player if they would like to play again. 1 for yes. 0 for no.

Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.name: snarkyGameWinText(_:)
Classes/Bagels.html#/s:18Applebaum_Ian_L.abstract: Console gets sassy if you take too many tries to win
